data.text: @Dumisa_Lungiswa They have 6 kids together. Six. Private schooling isn’t cheap. The kind of lifestyle that these kids are accustomed to is not cheap. He’s worth way more than her. He should do what’s right.
@RediscoverTK Maybe she wants him back

@RediscoverTK I mean why does she bother herself with Brett Pitt who isn't paying for child support cause  she can afford to feed the kids...rather than allowing the tabloids,courts & Brett to drag her name
@Dumisa_Lungiswa Why would THEE Angelina Jolie want to seek attention? I’m genuinely curious  as to why you thought she would do that.

@AlexanderAntw18 @BuzzFeedNews WHO said we believe Angelina? I'm reacting to what people under the comments are saying.  Read the other comments, people don't think Brad should have any responsibilities to his kids because the mother is rich. Tell me that's normal.
@Elizabe13065889 @BuzzFeedNews You sound ignorant

@akiMokoena7 @BuzzFeedNews Brad Pitt says he pays for the kids but you are still believing someone who is practicing parental alienation,falsely accuse her husband of Child Abuse simply because she is a woman.what world we live in
@just_tee_kay Basically it's, don't inconvenience a man. It's a woman's duty to raise the kids but a man's choice.

@akiMokoena7 All of the comments under this tweet are from people basically saying that he shouldn’t contribute because she’s also rich. I am so worried about the thought process of some folk. WHY shouldn’t he pay? They’re his kids too.

@BuzzFeedNews People think Brad Pitt shouldn't be expected to financially contribute to his kids upbringing because Angelina has money. Sooo Angelina's money is for her kids while Brad can do whatever he wants with his. Lol ya'll  really hate women(yes women too)
@BuzzFeedNews What support does she need????🤔 She wanted all them kids and she’ll never run out of money! Leave Brad alone!🤷🏽‍♀️ SMH!!!🤦🏾‍♀️
@BuzzFeedNews what half a mile not enough?.. greedy biatch..are they fed...clothed? Move on spoiled rich girl.
@BigAbeComedy @BuzzFeedNews 😆
@BuzzFeedNews Why does she need money ?

@BuzzFeedNews This story doesn't add up Angelina Jolie is a multi millionaire so why would she need child support payments from Brad? She isn't some poor woman living in the projects whose baby daddy isn't paying up. This is a very rich woman who clearly is still mad Brad cheated on her.
@BuzzFeedNews You’ve got enough Jolie. Get over it
@BuzzFeedNews I think she's just seeking for attention

@BuzzFeedNews She's worth $160M, he's worth $240M
I'm not worried.  Those kids will be just fine.

@BuzzFeedNews Child support is for single parents who need it to survive and provide for their kids. Jolie needs to stop being a crazy-ass and let it go. She has enough money to raise her kids, and probably quite a few other familes as well.
@BuzzFeedNews Please rich people problems
@JennMoore @BuzzFeedNews I do.💔
@BuzzFeedNews I don’t really care. Do u?
@BuzzFeedNews She sounds like a witch.
@BuzzFeedNews what exactly does “meaningful” mean? Are we talking thousands or millions?
